string.name: about_mentor
string.br: \u2022 \t Worked with Mark Zuckerberg and led the team that built Facebook Messenger. \n
\u2022 \t Responsible for setting up Facebook’s office outside the US. \n
\u2022 \t A star coder who represented India in the ICPC World Finals twice. \n

resources.string:
U+000B7 Worked with Mark Zuckerberg and led the team that built Facebook Messenger.

U+000B7 Responsible for setting up Facebook’s office outside the US.

U+000B7 A star coder who represented India in the ICPC World Finals twice.
